name: Toolsuu the Legend
description:
Toolsuu, a being of pure energy who lives in a reality beyond comprehension.

A world of balance and tranquility filled with light, but from a specific event, it gave way to chaos, it's up to our protagonist to survive and find a way to unravel what caused such disorder, bringing order to his world again.

Do your best and make it to the end of this journey.
